ExtendedProperties.Name: Target
ExtendedProperties.Value: So will suffice you against them

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَإِنَّمَا هُمْ فِى شِقَاقٍۢ ۖ فَسَيَكْفِيكَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: they turn away then only they (are) in dissension So will suffice you against them Allah and He (is) the All-Hearing the All-Knowing

ExtendedProperties.Value: Was mankind a community single then raised up Allah [the] Prophets (as) bearers of glad tidings and (as) warners

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: (of) Allah And they learn what harms them and not profits them And indeed they knew that whoever buys it not

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: [what] came to you of the knowledge indeed, you (would) then (be) surely among the wrongdoers

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: And for Allah (is) the east and the west so wherever you turn [so] there (is the) face (of) Allah Indeed Allah

ExtendedProperties.Value: the Most Gracious in the unseen So give him glad tidings of forgiveness and a reward noble

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: and perhaps [that] you love a thing and it (is) bad for you And Allah knows while you (do) not

ExtendedProperties.Value: He raised him He said How long (have) you remained He said I remained (for) a day or a part (of) a day He said

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: Then when set out Talut with the forces he said Indeed Allah will test you with a river

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: [of it] (to bear) And pardon [from] us and forgive [for] us and have mercy on us You (are) our Protector so help us against the people

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: Except those who repent[ed] and reform[ed] and openly declar[ed] Then those I will accept repentance from them and I (am)

ExtendedProperties.Value: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنْ مَنَعَ مَسَاجِدَ اللَّهِ أَنْ يُذْكَرَ فِيهَا اسْمُهُ

ExtendedProperties.Value: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن مَّنَعَ مَسَـٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ أَن يُذْكَرَ فِيهَا ٱسْمُهُۥ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: And who (is) more unjust than (one) who prevents (the) masajid (of) Allah to be mentioned in them His name

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: any knowledge and not their forefathers Grave (is) the word (that) comes out of their mouths Not they say

ExtendedProperties.Value: وَلَهُنَّ مِثْلُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَيْهِنَّ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ ۚ وَلِلرِّجَالِ عَلَيْهِنَّ دَرَجَةٌۭ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: And for them (is the) like (of) that which (is) on them in a reasonable manner and for the men over them (is) a degree And Allah (is) All-Mighty All-Wise

ExtendedProperties.Value: إِنْ يُرِدْنِ الرَّحْمَٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَا تُغْنِ عَنِّي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: إِن يُرِدْنِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّۢ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: If intends for me the Most Gracious any harm not will avail [from] me their intercession (in) anything and not they (can) save me

ExtendedProperties.Value: وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُعَلِّمُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ ٱلسِّحْرَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَى ٱلْمَلَكَيْنِ بِبَابِلَ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: [and] but the devils disbelieved they teach the people [the] magic and what was sent down to the two angels in Babylon

ExtendedProperties.Name: Example
ExtendedProperties.Value: وَيُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهَا حُسْبَانًا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ فَتُصْبِحَ صَعِيدًا زَلَقًا

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset

ExtendedProperties.Value: ٱللَّهَ وَبِٱلْوَٰلِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًۭا وَذِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَٱلْيَتَـٰمَىٰ وَٱلْمَسَـٰكِينِ وَقُولُوا۟ لِلنَّاسِ حُسْنًۭا وَأَقِيمُوا۟

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: Allah and with [the] parents (be) good and (with) relatives and [the] orphans and the needy and speak to [the] people good and establish

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْ لِذَنۢبِكَ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُمْ وَمَثْوَىٰكُمْ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: but Allah and ask forgiveness for your sin and for the believing men and the believing women And Allah knows your movement and your resting places

ExtendedProperties.Name: Example
ExtendedProperties.Value: وَمَثَلُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا كَمَثَلِ الَّذِي يَنْعِقُ بِمَا لَا يَسْمَعُ إِلَّا دُعَاءً وَنِدَاءً

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: يَنْعِقُ بِمَا لَا يَسْمَعُ إِلَّا دُعَآءًۭ وَنِدَآءًۭ ۚ صُمٌّۢ بُكْمٌ عُمْىٌۭ فَهُمْ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: shouts at what not (does) hear except calls and cries  deaf dumb (and) blind [so] they
